snippet: A man who evaded arrest and prosecution for more than a decade was convicted today of killing 11 people in a sex-slavery scheme run from a cabin in the Sierra Nevada foothills in 1984 and 1985....
lead_paragraph: A man who evaded arrest and prosecution for more than a decade was convicted today of killing 11 people in a sex-slavery scheme run from a cabin in the Sierra Nevada foothills in 1984 and 1985.
abstract: Charles Ng is convicted of killing 11 people in sex-slavery scheme in 1984 and 1985; murder prosecution is longest and costliest in California history (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; Californian Convicted In Sex-Scheme Murders
